5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Whoever regularly prays two Rak’ah of Duha, his sins will be forgiven even if they are like the foam of the sea.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ الضُّحَى
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Duha Prayer
